00007 BOOST_AUTO_TEST_CASE( CheckEquals)
00008 {
00009         TestClass* t = new TestClass();
00010         IntCondition<TestClass>* c1 = new IntCondition<TestClass>(&TestClass::return5,EQUAL,5);
00011         c1->init(t);
00012         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(c1->execute(t),BT_SUCCESS);
00013         delete c1;
00014 
00015         IntCondition<TestClass>* c2 = new IntCondition<TestClass>(&TestClass::return5,EQUAL,10);
00016         c2->init(t);
00017         BOOST_CHECK_EQUAL(c2->execute(t),BT_FAILURE);
00018         delete c2;
00019         delete t;
